name: Ext_R3_MeasureReport_evaluatedResources
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.MeasureReport.evaluatedResources for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MeasureReport.evaluatedResources from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MeasureReport|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: What data was evaluated to produce the measure score
element.definition: A reference to a Bundle containing the Resources that were used in the evaluation of this report.
element.comment: `MeasureReport.evaluatedResources` maps to R4 `MeasureReport.evaluatedResource`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo.
